drawer.subtitle: The address entered has no legal value. It will be shown on PDND Interoperabilit√† as a reference point to facilitate the direct exchange of information between members (e.g. requests for support and clarification, etc.).
drawer.mailChangeAlert: The information on the interface will be updated but not all members will be notified of the changes made.

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: Below are all the certified, verified or declared attributes that your organization possesses.

declared.noAttributesLabel: You have not submitted any declared attributes

tabs.ariaLabel: Two different tabs for managing certified attributes and for their assignment and revocation

drawer.title: Create new certificate attribute
drawer.subtitle: Once created, you can assign and revoke this attribute to other entities

drawer.title: Assign attribute
drawer.subtitle: The assigned body will be able to use the selected certified attribute for all e-services present on PDND Interoperability

tabs.ariaLabel: Three different tabs for managing granted delegations, received delegations and the availability to be delegated

list.noDelegationsLabel: There are no delegations to show

eserviceField.label: E-service name (required)
eserviceField.infoLabelAutocomplete: The list includes only those  e-services for which the respective producers have given availability to consume by delegation.
eserviceField.descriptionInfoLabel: Include input and output data in the description. Min 10 chars, max 250 chars

consume.label: Delegated tenant (required)
consume.infoLabel: The list includes only members who have given their willingness to become consumer delegates.

provide.label: Delegated tenant (required)
provide.infoLabel: The list includes only members who have given their willingness to become provider delegates.
provide.switch: I have already created the e-service for which I want to activate a delegation

dialog.title: Appointment of data controller
dialog.description: Please note that is the obligation of the delegator to proceed at the appointment of the delegate as the person responsible for the processing of personal data by formalizing the act provided for in art. 28 of GDPR, before to star any processing activity through the infrastructure.

details.title: Manage delegation
details.rejectedDelegationAlert: This delegation has been rejected. <1>Read here the reject reason</1>.

consumeDelegation.label: Consume delegation
consumeDelegation.infoLabel: Availability of tenant to consume e-service on behalf of others tenants

produceDelegation.label: Provide delegation
produceDelegation.infoLabel: Availability of tenant to provide e-service on behalf of others tenants
